itemLabel: Ben Stoneham, Baron Stoneham of Droxford

wikipedia_page.main: Benjamin Russell Mackintosh Stoneham, Baron Stoneham of Droxford (born 26 August 1948) is a British peer, journalist, and Liberal Democrat politician. He is currently the Liberal Democrat Chief Whip in the House of Lords, having been elected to that position in October 2016.

link_mentions.page: List of barons in the peerages of Britain and Ireland

response: *Ben Stoneham, Baron Stoneham of Droxford (1948–), Liberal Democrat Chief Whip of the House of Lords (2012–2016)
